intro: Bloodthirsty bunnies, combos, and chaos. Unleash your furry rage to defend the Bunny Kingdom from certain doom!
description:
Sci-fi, bloodthirsty bunnies, and the powers of a goddess at your disposal. This is Bunny Battle Nemesis. Experience intense action, explosions, and chaos as you defend the Bunny Kingdom from certain doom at the hands of a vengeful demigod and her army of mercenaries.

Included Bunny Lord: Fight with Bunny Lord. Murder today for a better tomorrow.

Bunny Battle Nemesis delivers a challenging arcade-style experience filled with intense combat, local co-op, and chaos-fueled gameplay. Master the Fight System to become a true Combo Beast, and battle through waves of enemies using uniquely skilled heroes. Customize and upgrade your characters for even greater destruction.

Featuring a vibrant, over-the-top art style and an infinite mode where you can FIGHT FOR ETERNITY. Explore diverse environments across the Bunny Kingdom and uncover the mysteries of the DCF Universe.
